data: {"generalSituation":"The band of clouds covering Guangdong will thin out in the next couple of days, it will be brighter over the region. Under the influence of the strong easterly airstream, it will be cloudier and windy over the coast of Guangdong in the latter part of this week. A northeast monsoon is expected to affect the coastal areas over the weekend, the weather will become cool over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260127","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
